01.message: Access denied to service (permission does not exist)
01.details: The user does not have permission to access the service. The user group lacks the required privileges.

02.message: Access denied to service, user blocked by firewall
02.details: Access to the service has been blocked for this user due to firewall settings.

03.message: Access denied to service, incorrect api_key
03.details: Access to the service has been denied due to an incorrect api_key.

04.message: Access denied to service, incorrect service_key
04.details: Access to the service has been denied due to an incorrect service_key.

05.message: Access denied to service, recent transaction
05.details: Access to the service has been denied due to a recent transaction that requires processing time.

01.message: User not found in the database, login failed
01.details: We couldn't find your account in our database. Your login attempt has failed.

02.message: Your session has expired or doesn't exist
02.details: Your session has expired or doesn't exist. Please log in again.

03.details: Your session has expired for security reasons. Please log in again.

04.details: The authentication token you provided is not valid. Please check and try again.

05.details: Authentication failed. Your provided token does not match our records.

06.details: We couldn't log you out because there is no active session for your account.
